title: Remembering Dirk Nowitzki's Incredible Career With Marc Stein | The Bill Simmons Podcast
description:
HBO and The Ringer's Bill Simmons recaps his weekend at NXT and 'WrestleMania 35' in New York with his son Ben (2:55). Then, Bill is joined by Marc Stein of The New York Times to discuss Dirk Nowitzki's career as one of the best power forwards to ever play the game (11:35).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
